result.eng: I sing in church on Sundays.
result.ga: Canaim sa séipéal ar an Domhnach
result.orig: Canaim sa séipéal ar an Domhnach
result.html: Canaim sa séipéal ar an DomhnachI sing in church on Sundays.
result.ponchtml: Canaim sa séipéal ar an DoṁnaċI sing in church on Sundays.

result.eng: Sundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.
result.ga: Dé Domhnaigh bím ag obair - ag déanamh réidh don tseachtain úr
result.orig: Dé Domhnaigh bím ag obair - ag déanamh réidh don tseachtain úr
result.html: Dé Domhnaigh bím ag obair - ag déanamh réidh don tseachtain úrSundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.
result.ponchtml: Dé Doṁnaiġ bím ag obair - ag déanaṁ réiḋ don tseaċtain úrSundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.
